title: Chicken on crispy noodles
description: A flavourful dish that can be whipped together in no time, perfect for a speedy supper.
ingredients: 225g/8oz boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips
½ tsp freshly ground white pepper
225g/8oz fresh thin egg noodles (substitute dried egg noodles if unavailable)
2 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
1 tbsp cornflour, mixed with 1½ tbsp water
3 tbsp finely chopped spring onions, to garnish
